cardText.p1: Vuetify is a progressive Material Design component framework for Vue.js. It was designed to empower developers to create amazing applications.
cardText.p2: For more information on Vuetify, check out the documentation.
cardText.p3: If you have questions, please join the official discord.
cardText.p4: Find a bug? Report it on the github issue board.
cardText.p5: Thank you for developing with Vuetify and I look forward to bringing more exciting features in the future.

inspire.message: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
